values.value: Added as part of SE-511/SE-590 to use in HRCFSL_ServiceReportHelper class

Attached is a service estimate for serial number {#serialNumber} based on our service engineers recent inspection. This estimate does not include taxes which will be determined based on the locality where the work is performed.
In order to keep your equipment maintained in accordance with the manufacturerâ€™s specifications, please provide us with a Purchase Order Number to allow us to proceed with the repair.
This estimate is valid for 60 days from the date shown on the estimate.
Regards,
Hillrom Service
